content.raw:
Thanks for the clarification! I didn't know that cloudsim-portal used default values if these were empty. That's good!

Do you think the user would want to know about this? Should we explicitly tell them that they can leave all the fields empty, in order to use the default values? We could say in the warning: "Please fill all the fields for the machine to work, or leave them all empty to use default values".

Otherwise, the warning should instruct them to fill all the fields, only if any of them is filled.
